segments.text: The kitchen layout is simple, with cabinets and counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman faces away, focused on drying a single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on, sink full, overflow startingâ€”how typical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damages the wood, spreading slickness everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She steps in it unknowingly, expression blank.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on unstable stool, hand in cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched tall, plate in other hand for balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl assists by reaching up, palm ready for cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret operation is clever, if risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the stool will give way any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a peaceful yard path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, letting in light on this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how unaware everyone seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies might not be worth the potential fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
